name: Garden.exe
description:
A game created for the #Luigikidexechallenge2. It took me 17 days to make, and I might add more stuff later, but nothing guaranteed.

Welcome to the Chao Garden Mini! A port of the official version of The Tiny Chao Garden from the Sonic Advance series.

Feed your chao with tons of fruits to your disposal.

A minigame to entertain you and your chao, while you collect more rings to help your chao.

Over 20 dialogues that your chao can speak out.

Hop on now and enjoy your new chao in Chao Garden Mini!
